pull.title: Replace CAffectedKeysVisitor with descriptor based logic
pull.body: It seems we don't need a custom visitor pattern anymore to find what keys are affected by a script. Instead, infer the descriptor, and see which keys it expands to.

events.message: Replace CAffectedKeysVisitor with descriptor based logic

issue.title: Avoid expanding descriptor scriptPubKeys
issue.body:
Output scripts aren't needed in `GetAffectedKeys`, this change avoids computing them.

Based on #14821.

issue.title: tests: Fix cuckoocache_tests TSAN failure introduced in 14935.
issue.body: Fix cuckoocache_tests TSAN failure introduced in #14935. Fixes #14967.

issue.title: Import watch only pubkeys to the keypool if private keys are disabled
issue.body: If the wallet has private keys disabled, allow importing public keys into the keypool. A `keypool` option has been added to `importmulti` in order to signal that the keys should be added to the keypool.

comments.body: nit, `static`. Could also keep some comment.
Could even make it more specific with the updated behavior.
